job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Skills Requiredbr	Medical device or any regulatory industry company experience required br	Degree in computer science or software engineering or electrical engineering br	510 years experience in software development within Linux OS with the help of CCbr	Scripting in python is good to havebr	Translating software requirements into software design experiencebr	Someone who understands threading and processes in Linux real time operating systems UML software architecture ITC interface protocol write API br	Cyber security private or public keys or encryption is a plusbr	IEC 62304 or ISO 14971 risk regulations is a plusbr	Soft skills work well in a team environment under agile methodologybr
